entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coronach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronach 1:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -28.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
